regularTasks.title: Review project requirements
regularTasks.description: Go through the project specifications and identify any unclear points

regularTasks.title: Update documentation
regularTasks.description: Update the README file with the latest changes

regularTasks.title: Send status report
regularTasks.description: Email the weekly status report to the team

regularTasks.description: Install and configure all required tools for the project

priorityTasks.title: Fix login bug
priorityTasks.description: Address the issue with user authentication in the login screen

priorityTasks.title: Prepare for client demo
priorityTasks.description: Prepare slides and demo script for the upcoming client presentation

priorityTasks.title: Review security vulnerabilities
priorityTasks.description: Check the security report and address critical issues

priorityTasks.title: Optimize database queries
priorityTasks.description: Improve performance of slow database operations

priorityTasks.title: Update third-party libraries
priorityTasks.description: Update dependencies to their latest versions

recurringTasks.title: Team status meeting
recurringTasks.description: Participate in the daily team standup meeting

recurringTasks.title: Code review session
recurringTasks.description: Review pull requests from team members

recurringTasks.title: Generate monthly report
recurringTasks.description: Prepare and distribute the monthly progress report

recurringTasks.title: Backup project data
recurringTasks.description: Run the backup script for all project data
